data.title: remove CURL link on Android
data.body: since cocos2d-x doesn't depend on CURL, so we should remove the link in Android.mk and Xcode project setting for iOS.

data.title: fix: display FPS again on GLFW platforms
data.body:
Apparently GLFW stop emitting some events that creation time.

Fixes issue #16139

data.title: New PR based on @Jaxz PR - Rewrote all action ease classes using templates
data.body:
Duplicated Jakz PR to maybe get into 3.13 since it appears to be inactive since April.

I'm also thinking that maybe there could be a more generic data driven Action refactor where there's only one or a couple actual functions instead of the many functions that currently exist. This may not be as performant, however, so will have to test out an idea or two and I'll post discussion on forum first if I implement something.

Original PR Desc:

> Rewrote all action ease classes using templates to remove the redundancy of having a single class definition for every possible ease function. This has been done through some template classes which accept functions as arguments.
> 
> This makes both header and source file much shorter and much more maintanable. Readability shouldn't be a concern since now there is almost no code to read.
> 
> Performance should identical since everything is bound at compile time. The following patch should be compatible with all recent (C++11) compilers but I have no way to test it, I tested it on LLVM3.4 on a OS X machine.
> 
> This patch also gives the possiblity to have ready to go custom ease function without the need to sublass ActionEase at all (as long as the prototype of the function is supported).

data.title: [Cocos2d-x 3.12] extensions::ControlSwitch::create() bug
data.body:
The function 
`ControlSwitch* create(Sprite *maskSprite, Sprite * onSprite, Sprite * offSprite, Sprite * thumbSprite)` makes the game to crash because calls `addChild` on `nullptr` object.
The function tries to add a null `Label` that user can specify using this other function:
`ControlSwitch* create(Sprite *maskSprite, Sprite * onSprite, Sprite * offSprite, Sprite * thumbSprite, Label* onLabel, Label* offLabel)`

data.title: PUParticleSystem3D object would miss its texture
data.body:
While the PUParticleSystem3D objects are running on the scene, we call the function removeUnusedTextures, then the PUParticleSystem3D objects miss all their textures. So the refcount of texture of PUParticleSystem3D objects is not right.
The version of engine we are using is 3.8.1

1. cocos new -l js ...
2. cocos run -p linux ...

data.title: Sprite3D can't release its texture
data.body:
Create a sprite3d object, and then add it to one layer. After a while remove it from parent, then the texture it refred can't be released after calling the function removeUnusedTextures!
This is a very serious issue, because it can consume much memory when there are many 3d sprites on one scene.
The version of engine we are using is 3.8.1

data.title: Renderer addCommand problem
data.body: Renderer hold the command with a c pointer,if a node add the command to the render,and the render havnt do the render,and the node is releaseed,so the command pointer is wildpointer

data.title: Fix spelling for `getPolygonCenter` function
data.body:
This PR deprecates the misspelled `getPolyonCenter` function in favour of correctly spelled `getPolygonCenter` in PhysicsShape class. It does the following:
- Replaces the `getPolyonCenter` declaration and definition with `getPolygonCenter`
- Adds deprecated `getPolyonCenter` function to keep backward compatibility
- Lua binding is also the same as C++ code

Thanks.

data.title: Rich text "fixed width" mode is needed
data.body:
When RichText widget is in ignoreContentAdaptWithSize mode it's impossible to use it in fixed width elements, but it updates it's size correctly. If ignoreContentAdaptWithSize is false RichText text keeps it's with and height same, and no matters what content is inside, and there is no way to get it's real height.

It would be very useful to create mode in witch Rich text widget keeps width fixed but updates height with real height of content.

data.title: Rich text elements positioning is incorrect
data.body:
Positioning in rich text is incorrect:
![wrong](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4668006/16914207/915443fc-4cf0-11e6-953e-02586031fafc.png)

Look like it must be something like:
![wright](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4668006/16914203/88b535b2-4cf0-11e6-981d-0373ec2ea378.png)

Also same problem can be visualized if you will use labels with different font sizes in one rich text element:
![wrong1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4668006/16914237/d77dd9e2-4cf0-11e6-9125-cb29ffff93c6.png)

Also various vertical aligning options are strongly needed.

data.title: Fix misspelled enum: POLYGEN -> POLYGON
data.body:
I noticed that there are minor misspellings in the `PhysicsShape::Type` enum. `POLYGEN` should be `POLYGON`, `EDGEPOLYGEN` should be `EDGEPOLYGON`.

This pull request fixes them and also keeps backward compatibility of API.
Thanks.

data.title: [audio] Fixes some issues while stop/uncache right after play/preload on OSX/iOS platform.
AudioEngine 在android上播放循环音效不能完美循环播放，连接处有断裂
data.body:
cocos2dx版本：v3.12版本
运行平台：android（sdk 4.x和N都试过）
问题：audioEngine在android上播放循环音效无法完美循环，音效播放结束重新回到到音头时，中间出现卡顿（空白），之前ios上播放mp3时也无法循环，后来我们发现是音频本身的问题，修改过后能够循环了（最后使用.m4a格式的音频），但是andriod上我们使用过.ogg、.flac、.m4a、.mp3的都无法循环播放（音频确定已经去掉压缩的头，用audition能循环起来），最后我们找来很多类型android机，发现部分机型能循环，有的又不能循环（三星G6 Edge就无法循环，但G Note Edge又能循环）！有木有人遇到这个问题？

data.title: Update the test case of hex map with axis is x.
data.body:
Related issue : https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/16105

@ricardoquesada 
Once there are more tiles in the hex map with axis is x. The effect is error again. 
Could you please check it once more? Thanks.

BTW, I think the existing test cases `32:TMX Hex Odd X` & `33:TMX Hex Even X` are not the common usage of hex map. Because the `png` file used by the `tmx` file is for **Axis is Y**:
![hexmini.png](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/tests/cpp-tests/Resources/TileMaps/hexmini.png?raw=true)

- then you will find the FPS is disappeared

I think all platforms has the issue.  @ricardoquesada could you please take a look. Thanks.

data.title: Cocos console on MAC getting error (again) :ValueError: unknown locale: UTF-8
data.body:
downloaded the latest version 3.12 
this used to be in some of the previous  versions   , 
i executed :  cocos new help
Got this error : 

```
meirs-Mac-mini:cocos2d-x-3.12 meiryanovich$ cocos new help
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/meiryanovich/Documents/cocos2d-x/cocos2d-x-3.12/tools/cocos2d-console/bin/cocos.py", line 22, in <module>
    import cocos_project
  File "/Users/meiryanovich/Documents/cocos2d-x/cocos2d-x-3.12/tools/cocos2d-console/bin/cocos_project.py", line 4, in <module>
    import cocos
  File "/Users/meiryanovich/Documents/cocos2d-x/cocos2d-x-3.12/tools/cocos2d-console/bin/cocos.py", line 936, in <module>
    language, encoding = locale.getlocale()
  File "/System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/locale.py", line 562, in getlocale
    return _parse_localename(localename)
  File "/System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/locale.py", line 475, in _parse_localename
    raise ValueError, 'unknown locale: %s' % localename
ValueError: unknown locale: UTF-8

```

i was able  to fix this problem executing those commands in the shell :

```
meirs-Mac-mini:cocos2d-x-3.12 meiryanovich$ export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8
meirs-Mac-mini:cocos2d-x-3.12 meiryanovich$ export LANG=en_US.UTF-8
```

can it be combined in the setup.py or something ? 
Thanks
